arStrings.szText: Depends who you ask. Last I saw them, I was pointing a crossbow at their mother as they sobbed, begging me not to do it, heh. Oh, the way Rea looked at me...
That's when I knew they were mine. Hm. How I'd always wondered, but... then I knew. That's why she had to kill him. Why she had to kill my brother, you see. Because he knew too.
Voice cracking. Lump in his throat.
The last news I got was that Thieves Guild medallion. Rea always knew how to twist the knife. My own children accepted as guild members. Humph.
